channel.title: Rust on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Joone Blog

item.title: rust-animation project
item.description: I had used GNOME Clutter project before when I worked on Accelerated Compositing in the WebKit clutter port.

item.title: Rust & DRM
item.description: I was surprised that there are many low-level graphics projects written in Rust and I started looking into one of them: drm-rs.
